forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 33. West wind 8 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
The night in Boston envelops the city in a blanket of stillness, punctuated only by the distant twinkle of lights reflecting the tranquility of the southern sky. As temperatures settle into the low twenties, a gentle western breeze whispers through the streets, reminding all of the crispness that winter brings. This evening invites moments of contemplation—better suited for a warm drink in a cozy nook than brisk ventures outside. 

Awakened by the dawn, Friday will offer a promise of sunshine, brightening the chill-filled air to a slightly more inviting thirty-three degrees. This clear day will unfold under the expansive azure, encouraging an exploration of the city's winter charm. As you step outside, a layered approach to dressing will keep you comfortable—the warmth of a well-worn wool sweater, perhaps coupled with a trusty coat, will serve you well against the brisk winds. Consider a stroll—perhaps through the calm paths of a local park, where the bare branches softly frame the sky. Or take a moment to pause with a good book at a nearby café, soaking in the warmth while the world beyond glistens in the winter sun.
